extendedInfo.description: The Official CarWale App for Android handsets. Your one-stop-shop for extensive research based data on cars available in India; their specifications, standard features and ex-showroom prices. Search for the best used car for yourself, get prices and connect with the dealer. This app also offers CarWale's very popular EMI Calculator tool. Now, owning your car is just a click away!Key Features1. New Car research i.e. car specifications, features and ex-showroom price.2. Used Car search - connect with the dealer3. EMI Calculator Tool to find out your monthly installment

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice app overall, but has room for improvement such as where it says a car has some number of reviews, they should also be readable and that makes it complete. A tool for \"compare\" would add honey to the pie.
reviews.author: Varun Arora

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: Its very useful.....but need to map all vehicles....such as commercial vehicle also....volvo car is missing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: After recent update, I get \'Connection Problem\'. Cannot proceed, so now uninstalling it. X10 mini.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: A pocket guide that gives a fairly accurate idea of Indian Market. Thank You.
reviews.author: Sareesh Chandrawanshi

reviews.title: Useless app
reviews.comment: Crap app !! Developers need to do something about the app crashing every time you want to fetch details of seller after short listing the car.!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful App .....but need to fix more bugs
reviews.comment: I use CarWale website...but when i saw in palystore i was very happy. Overall it looks good but in my Samsung Galaxy Fit device I couldn\'t scroll down/up ..and some more regression testing is required before it comes into playstore I feel.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice and handy
reviews.comment: A suggestion-provide link to the reviews. That will make it complete.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really nice apps
reviews.comment: wow... its amezing apps for choosing ur right car... if you don\'t to buy it you just collect all information about cars and their rates ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Suggestion : Should include the ability to list the search results per the price in ascending or descending order, not just alphabetically!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Few suggestion 1. Radio buttons in menus while selecting car make,body type etc should be replaced with check boxes 2. Let user select the price range dont force a few options, give max and min price text fields for selecting price range
reviews.author: Avadhesh Bhatnagar

reviews.title: Good, the one
reviews.comment: So disgusting, no test done before launching,connection error. Not acceptable in old version. A lot improved now..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps on crashin alot..Need to list more cars..
reviews.comment: It crashes alot..it cn b a very gud app if u solve dis issue..n u guys need to add more cars..(so apart from mumbai der r other cities too)..Gud luck..!
reviews.author: Chirag Sagar

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.comment: This app isn\'t pretty and it doesn\'t use any mobile features (for eg. geolocation for city), but it does the job of getting you the info you need without requiring you to go to the website. It works.
reviews.author: Aalaap Ghag

reviews.title: No network available
reviews.comment: Whenever i open this application it shows \"no network available\" while the networks are avaible and internet is working well with good speed and the application get closed .please fix the problem as soon as possible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: please add the option of upcoming cars and also add peugeot, limozin, and McLaren...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FC sometimes
reviews.comment: Excellent design n info. But app force closes sometimes. Otherwise its an unrivalled app. More features like reviews, news etc. could be added. Edit: Doesn\'t work on tablets..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bullshit
reviews.comment: It should go in the Guinness book for the sheer number of times it fcs. Crap... needs a lot of updates
reviews.author: Dominic D\'Costa

reviews.title: Sexy
reviews.comment: Now i can use this app in office
